kizuna_head_d_01:
Thank you again for your outstanding work on
Operation Starfall.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_d_02:
I cannot tell you how relieved I am that we were
able to help Miss Penny as we did.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_d_03:
And I know she is exceedingly grateful to you for
your part in all this.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_d_04:
So, I have one more thing to ask of you—though
the request is admittedly of a delicate nature.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_d_05:
Do you think you could continue being good
friends with Miss Penny as you have thus far?[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_d_06:
I must say...I truly am glad to have you as one
of my students at the academy.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_d_07:
I believe you’ve more than earned this small
token of my appreciation.[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_d_08:
I hope that you will always stay just as wonderful
as you are now, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(000A)]
kizuna_head_d_system_01: You formed a close bond with Director Clavell!
